noun.description: A fluid-filled sac or saclike cavity, especially one countering friction at a joint.

proper noun.description: A city in northwestern Turkey, capital of a province of the same name; population 1,431,200 (est. 2007). It was the capital of the Ottoman Empire from 1326–1402.

origin: Early 19th century: from medieval Latin, bag, purse, from Greek bursa leather.
